roleset.name: result in, produce
roleset.note: YIELD-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. No Vncls. (from yield.01-v)

example.name: with temporal
example.text: A single acre of grapes yielded a mere 75 cases in 1987.

roleset.name: give way, give in to another
roleset.note: YIELD-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of VNcls acquiesce-95, future_having-13.3. (from yield.02-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: John yielded the right-of-way to the Mack truck.

example.name: another lost thing lost
example.text: The US yielded to the temptation to avoid the danger of combat.
example.arg: to the temptation to avoid the danger of combat.

example.name: savings bond
example.text: The Canadian government announced a new, 12-year Canada Savings Bond issue that *trace* will yield investors 10.5% in the first year.
example.arg: that -> a new, 12-year Canada Savings Bond issue

roleset.name: same as yield.02 with aspectual particle
roleset.note: YIELD_UP-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj revisions. Framed by Claire. (from yield.04-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: When , however , Claudio 's sister , Isabella , a novitiate in a convent , goes to Angelo to plead her brother 's case , the obdurate ruler immediately falls in love with her and , in a supreme act of hypocrisy , demands that Isabella yield up her virtue to him in exchange for her brother 's life .
example.arg: in exchange for her brother's life
